SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ServerSocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ServerSocketClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClientListener, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class ServerSocketClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable, IClientListener
this class handles the communication with the client associated to the assigned socket. It implements IClientListener so that the server can send replies and notification without having to know the type of connection chosen by the client.
See Also:
